Creating recipesÂ¶

To analyze the emotion contained in a sentence in English, you can use pymood.anlaysis_emotion() function This function analyzes the mood of sentences collected in English and returns emoticons that fit the situation.

pymood.anlaysis_emotion(kind=String)Â¶

Return a emoji.
